One Definition of Love is this: That in which is a chosen necessity in ones life to possess to have and to hold to cherish even to loosing of one's own life and health and wealth and even the denial of ones on will in all that does not go against Love.{{fact}}

−   −
Love is a state of mind that expresses an unconditional appreciation of anything seperate, subjects and objects alike around us. In that instance the person gives up the ego-clinging and perceives itself as not seperated from others but as a unity. This idea of unity gives rise to the emotion defined as love.
